long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social GPT - Free AI Writing Assistant

Transform any text on the web with powerful AI tools - completely free, private, and just a right-click away! 🚀

What Makes Social GPT Special?
✨ 100% Free - No hidden fees or premium features
🔒 Privacy First - No data collection or storage
⚡ Instant Access - No signup or account needed
🌐 Works Everywhere - Any website, any text
Five Powerful AI Tools at Your Fingertips
Just select text and right-click to:
✍️ Generate creative content with custom tone
💬 Answer with smart, contextual responses
🔄 Rewrite text while preserving meaning
✅ Proofread for perfect grammar and style
📝 Summarize long content instantly
Smart Features
🎯 Context-aware responses
🎨 Customizable writing styles
📱 Works on all major platforms
🔍 Real-time processing
🎭 Tone adaptation (formal, casual, professional)

Global Language Support
Available in 11 languages:
English, French, German
Spanish, Italian, Japanese
Korean, Chinese, Russian
Portuguese, Dutch
Who Is It For?

💼 Professionals crafting emails
📱 Social media enthusiasts
✍️ Content creators
📚 Students writing essays
🌐 Anyone who writes online!

Why Users Love Social GPT

"Game-changer for my daily writing!"
"Can't believe this is completely free"
"So simple yet so powerful"
"Works exactly where I need it"
Privacy & Security
No data collection
No account required
No tracking
No ads
Open source
Getting Started
Install the extension
Select any text
Right-click
Choose your AI tool
Get instant results!
Transform your writing experience with Social GPT - the free, private, and powerful AI writing assistant that's always just a right-click away.

Note: This extension uses AI technology to assist with writing tasks. While powerful, AI suggestions should be reviewed before use.
